candleman is a 3d puzzleplatform game where you have to guide a little candleman  who would have guessed  through a beautifully prepared dark maze solve puzzles here and there and find and light up other candles another mostly very calm game with an interesting gameplay and a nicely drawnup world to explore  its certainly been fun to guide the little man through the in total twelve main chapters
h1b amazing bh1 grate game concept is different and cool but anyways its worth some playtime for sure

loved this game  if you like games like limboinside or the last campfire this is up your alley too

a beautiful and heartwarming although rather easy platformer where you guide a little candle on his journey in search of purpose the lightning effects and how they are being used as a game mechanic are one of a kind and the game features a perfectly selected soundtrack playing in the background if you are looking for something relaxing while being pleasing for both the eyes and the ears give it a try

the visuals are very nice i really enjoyed them and how they change throughout the game also the story is cute the plottwist was truly unexpected for me very entertaining tbh at the beginning i thought it could be a bit boring but its fun and motivates you to get better and keep playing  i like that you play the story mode first and after the game changes and you get the time challenge mode i loved the game its beautiful
meh if you like collectibles and or achievements its fun enough plot and gameplay arent super fun unskippable cutscenes annoy

i love this game its relaxing but still engaging enough to keep you on your toes the little candleman is so adorable and the gameplay and graphics are amazing its such an awesome story to play through

very nice platformer with excellent graphic style with focus on lightcolors and different themes and puzzles for each level cute little story on top has a chapter structure with 10 minute levels that makes it easy to play bit by bit easy to complete in a few hours and mostly relaxing also contains a speedrun mode for a second playthrough recommended
the atmosphere and graphics are impressive the gameplay however is disgustingly slow and monotone despite the graphical beauty i couldnt be arsed to finish the game
this puzzle platformer that has a gimmick that is more unique than fun
this game is beautifully done such a cute little story the scenery is absolutely beautiful as well great job to the creators of this game you did such a good job
i loved the simple and the somewhat complex challenges the story line was great i enjoyed the whole game would recommend highly
unique simple and fun
the right mix of clever gameplay beautiful graphics and difficulty progression i never felt spoonfed nor did i feel unsure of what to do next treat yourself to this onesession wonder

i find this game to be a perfect mix of relaxing and interestingchallenging there is enough challenge to keep you trying but it is not impossible i think the graphics are nice and i enjoy the aesthetic and how it shifts throughout the game i told my friend it was like a pretty and less intense version of mario i havent completed the entire game but heres to hoping i enjoy the rest just as much as i have so far if not more
i enjoyed every minute of it

lovely game basic but solid platforming with a twist  the levels are dark so you need to burn yourself to illuminate them temporarily but your candle wax is also your health each chapter has unique new platforming gimmicks that i really enjoyed it has a nice message about letting your light shine even if its not the brightest i feel like someones mom saying that why did only 20 of people play it to the end that should be criminal
a charming and beautifully relaxing game everyone should play
a bit hard platforming in the dark but overall a beautiful looking game
its fun its colorful and the ingame scenery is breathtaking and beautiful the puzzles are also really great too they get thinking and the story is well put together

impressive little platformer with amazing level design and graphical presentation which involves a small candle brought to life for some reason and goes on a journey of self discovery  what may of put me off and some others is the frustrating and sometimes infuriating camera angles that will test even the most patient gamers at times but it didnt happen too often thankfully  overall id certainly give this a go and definitely if its on sale
a short but enjoyable game  story very casual and just relaxing to play

candleman is just so beautiful   it has stunning visuals great sound and music and a really sweet story   the game mechanics are really creative and keep the game engaging from start to finish  each level introduces something fresh  both mechanically and aesthetically it kept me on my toes but at the same time progression didnt feel overly difficult  now to go and 100 all the levels
this game is wonderful  classic platforming with a really nice visuals and the story is told as a kids book  i really recomend the game i am having a great experience with this
what a blazing game

all the flaws of the genre none of the potential entertainment  no saving limited lives and not interesting enough to motivate this player into overcoming these traditional nuisances its manic miner all over again without the technical excuses the gimmick of costly light could have made for a smart game instead they went for banal clunky 3d platforming only without visibility
the beauty of the scenarios does not make up for the awfull controls

perfect in its execution  a rocksolid puzzleplatformer with a unique conceit that would be enough to entertain me  but it is paired with a simple but moving emotional arc that kindled empathy within me  just brilliant
fun and relaxing candle game  i enjoyed the light exploration needed to find all the candles  lives are generous and new mechanics are introduced frequently
if you like scenic and beautiful wellmade games then this is for you each level is beautifully made offering little challenges and each has its own flair
extremely lovely game

this was a fun little puzzle game with a gorgeous coat of paint i could tell it was a real passion project of the developers with a lot of love built into it bug free and smooth framerate throughout not a game for character arcs or upgrade mechanics but a relaxing little platformer to escape for a few hours

a sweet little platformer thats way better than it needs to be it has a really nice combination of physics shadow and other fun puzzle types each level changes things up a bit and smoothly introduces each new mechanic it looks and sounds great too
definitely recommend clever game conceptidea beautiful graphics difficult at points but not unreasonable easy to learn cheerful story
